member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.HeaderNames.SecWebSocketVersion
member.summary: Represents the "sec-websocket-version" HTTP header, used to specify the WebSocket protocol version.

member.name: T:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.HeaderValues
member.summary: Provides a set of commonly used HTTP header values as constants.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.HeaderValues.KeepAliveUpgrade
member.summary: Represents the "keep-alive, upgrade" value, typically used in the "connection" HTTP header.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.HeaderValues.Upgrade
member.summary: Represents the "upgrade" value, used in the "connection" or "upgrade" HTTP headers.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.HeaderValues.WebSocket
member.summary: Represents the "websocket" value, used in the "upgrade" HTTP header to initiate WebSocket connections.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.HeaderValues.MessageHttp
member.summary: Represents the "message/http" value, used in the "content-type" HTTP header for HTTP TRACE requests.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.HeaderValues.SecWsVersion
member.summary: Represents the WebSocket protocol version "13", used in the "sec-websocket-version" HTTP header.

member.name: T:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode
member.summary: This enum represents various HTTP status codes as defined by the HTTP/1.1 standard and related extensions.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Continue
member.summary: Indicates that the client should continue with its request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.SwitchingProtocols
member.summary: Indicates that the server is switching protocols as requested by the client.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Processing
member.summary: Indicates that the server has received and is processing the request, but no response is available yet.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.EarlyHints
member.summary: A response code to provide early hints of the final HTTP status.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.OK
member.summary: Indicates that the request has succeeded.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Created
member.summary: Indicates that the request has been fulfilled and a new resource has been created.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Accepted
member.summary: Indicates that the request has been accepted for processing, but the processing is not complete.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.NonAuthoritativeInformation
member.summary: Indicates that the request was successful but the information may be from a third-party source.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.NoContent
member.summary: Indicates that the request was successful but there is no content to send in the response.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.ResetContent
member.summary: Indicates that the server successfully processed the request and is instructing the client to reset the view.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.PartialContent
member.summary: Indicates that the server successfully processed a partial GET request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.MultiStatus
member.summary: Indicates that the message body contains multiple status codes.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.AlreadyReported
member.summary: Indicates that the members of a DAV binding have already been enumerated.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.IMUsed
member.summary: Indicates that the server has fulfilled the GET request for the resource and that the response is a representation of the result of one or more instance manipulations applied to the current instance.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Ambiguous
member.summary: Indicates that the request has more than one possible response.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.MultipleChoices
member.summary: Indicates that the request has more than one possible response.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Moved
member.summary: Indicates that the resource has been moved to a different URL permanently.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.MovedPermanently
member.summary: Indicates that the resource has been moved to a different URL permanently.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Found
member.summary: Indicates that the resource has been found at a different URL temporarily.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Redirect
member.summary: Indicates that the resource has been found at a different URL temporarily.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.RedirectMethod
member.summary: Indicates that the resource can be found at a different URL and that the request method should not be changed.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.SeeOther
member.summary: Indicates that the resource can be found at a different URL and that the request method should not be changed.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.NotModified
member.summary: Indicates that the resource has not been modified since the last request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.UseProxy
member.summary: Indicates that the client must use a proxy to access the requested resource.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Unused
member.summary: This status code is no longer used and is reserved.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.RedirectKeepVerb
member.summary: Indicates that the request should be repeated with the same method, but to a different URL.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.TemporaryRedirect
member.summary: Indicates that the request should be repeated with the same method, but to a different URL.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.PermanentRedirect
member.summary: Indicates that the resource has been moved permanently, and future requests should use a different URL.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.BadRequest
member.summary: Indicates that the server cannot process the request due to a client error.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Unauthorized
member.summary: Indicates that the request requires user authentication.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.PaymentRequired
member.summary: Indicates that payment is required to access the resource.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Forbidden
member.summary: Indicates that the server understands the request but refuses to authorize it.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.NotFound
member.summary: Indicates that the server cannot find the requested resource.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.MethodNotAllowed
member.summary: Indicates that the request method is not allowed for the resource.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.NotAcceptable
member.summary: Indicates that the server cannot produce a response matching the list of acceptable values defined in the request's proactive content negotiation headers.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.ProxyAuthenticationRequired
member.summary: Indicates that the client must authenticate with the proxy before sending the request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Indicates that the server timed out waiting for the request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Conflict
member.summary: Indicates that the request could not be processed because of a conflict with the current state of the resource.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Gone
member.summary: Indicates that the requested resource is no longer available and will not be available again.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.LengthRequired
member.summary: Indicates that the request did not specify the length of its content, which is required by the requested resource.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.PreconditionFailed
member.summary: Indicates that one or more preconditions in the request header fields evaluated to false when tested on the server.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.RequestEntityTooLarge
member.summary: Indicates that the request is larger than the server is willing or able to process.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.RequestUriTooLong
member.summary: Indicates that the URI requested by the client is too long to be processed by the server.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.UnsupportedMediaType
member.summary: Indicates that the server cannot process the request because the media format of the requested data is not supported by the server.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.RequestedRangeNotSatisfiable
member.summary: Indicates that the range specified by the Range header field in the request cannot be fulfilled.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.ExpectationFailed
member.summary: Indicates that the server cannot meet the requirements of the Expect request-header field.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.MisdirectedRequest
member.summary: Indicates that the server cannot process the request because it was directed to an inappropriate server.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.UnprocessableEntity
member.summary: Indicates that the server cannot process the request due to a semantic error in the client's request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.Locked
member.summary: Indicates that the resource is locked.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.FailedDependency
member.summary: Indicates that the request failed because it depended on another request that failed.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.UpgradeRequired
member.summary: Indicates that the client should switch to a different protocol such as TLS/1.0.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.PreconditionRequired
member.summary: Indicates that the origin server requires the request to be conditional.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.TooManyRequests
member.summary: Indicates that the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.RequestHeaderFieldsTooLarge
member.summary: Indicates that the server is unwilling to process the request because its header fields are too large.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.UnavailableForLegalReasons
member.summary: Indicates that the server is denying access to the resource as a consequence of a legal demand.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.InternalServerError
member.summary: Indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.NotImplemented
member.summary: Indicates that the server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.BadGateway
member.summary: Indicates that the server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, received an invalid response from an inbound server it accessed while attempting to fulfill the request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.ServiceUnavailable
member.summary: Indicates that the server is currently unable to handle the request due to temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.GatewayTimeout
member.summary: Indicates that the server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, did not receive a timely response from an upstream server.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.HttpVersionNotSupported
member.summary: Indicates that the server does not support the HTTP protocol version used in the request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.VariantAlsoNegotiates
member.summary: Indicates that the server has an internal configuration error and the request could not be completed.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.InsufficientStorage
member.summary: Indicates that the server is unable to store the representation needed to complete the request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.LoopDetected
member.summary: Indicates that the server detected an infinite loop while processing the request.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.NotExtended
member.summary: Indicates that further extensions to the request are required for the server to fulfill it.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.StatusCode.NetworkAuthenticationRequired
member.summary: Indicates that the client needs to authenticate to gain network access.

member.name: T:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.WebSocketOpCodes
member.summary: This class contains constant byte values representing WebSocket operation codes.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.WebSocketOpCodes.FIN
member.summary: Indicates the final fragment in a WebSocket message.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.WebSocketOpCodes.TEXT
member.summary: Represents a text frame in WebSocket.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.WebSocketOpCodes.BINARY
member.summary: Represents a binary frame in WebSocket.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.WebSocketOpCodes.CLOSE
member.summary: Indicates a connection close frame in WebSocket.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.WebSocketOpCodes.PING
member.summary: Represents a ping frame in WebSocket.

member.name: F:XmobiTea.ProtonNetCommon.Types.WebSocketOpCodes.PONG
member.summary: Represents a pong frame in WebSocket.
